attributes.action: ensure that EVERY cash machine in the country offers a minimum dispensary option of five pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public should be allowed access to their money, even when they have only £9 or less in their account. They should not have to rely on chip and pin accounts in stores to spend under £5, especially as this is NOT a universal rule within shops.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
